initial_question.title: missing sat.model
initial_question.body:
Hello, thank you for open-sourcing such an excellent work !

But when I run `sat/demo.ipynb`, an error will be reported at the line from `sat.model.base_model import get_model`, prompting that `sat.model cannot be found`. 
I see that there is indeed no model folder in the sat, and there is no `get_model` function in the `base_model` file. Is it because a file was uploaded missing?
